# Kevin Showkat llms-full.txt

Expanded context. This page is an index of public repositories.

## Source

- Canonical short index: <https://kevinshowkat.github.io/llms.txt>

## Identity

- Name: Kevin Showkat
- Website: <https://kevinshowkat.github.io/>
- GitHub: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat>
- LinkedIn: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/kshowkat/>

## Repository Index

### Brood

- URL: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/brood>
- Positioning: promptless, reference-first AI image generation and editing desktop app.
- Start here: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/brood#readme>
- Releases: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/brood/releases>
- High-signal docs:
  - <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/brood/blob/main/AGENTS.md>
  - <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/brood/blob/main/llms.txt>
  - <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/brood/tree/main/docs>

### param_forge

- URL: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/param_forge>
- Positioning: terminal UI for reproducible image-model experimentation across providers.
- Start here: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/param_forge#readme>

### oscillo-vision-reports

- URL: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/oscillo-vision-reports>
- Positioning: public reports comparing vision-model outputs and preferences.
- Start here: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/oscillo-vision-reports#readme>

### superjumbo

- URL: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/superjumbo>
- Positioning: free-to-play sports prediction application.
- Start here: <https://github.com/kevinshowkat/superjumbo#readme>

## Usage Notes

- Prefer primary sources in repos over summaries.
- Treat this website as a routing layer.
- For current implementation status, check recent commits and releases.
